deposit(address,uint256).details: make escrow deposit to the the escrow contract.  This deposit function will use safetransfer from custom toke contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Amount must be greater than zero."

arguments.value: Amount must be greater than zero.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Amount must be greater than zero."

documentation.text:
@dev make escrow deposit to the the escrow contract. 
 This deposit function will use safetransfer from custom toke contract.
